original_text: And as he sat on the Mount of Olives opposite the temple, Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately,
korean_text: 예수께서 감람 산에서 성전을 마주 대하여 앉으셨을 때에 베드로와 야고보와 요한과 안드레가 조용히 묻되

sentences.original_text: And as he sat on the Mount of Olives
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 올리브 산에 앉아 있을 때

sentences.original_text: Peter and James and John and Andrew
